snippet.title: We Were Here Forever | Release Date Reveal
snippet.description:
Play the co-op puzzle adventure We Were Here Forever on May 10th on Steam and Epic! The releases for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5&4 will follow soon!

You and your partner are back in the cold Antarctic environment, where the ever so puzzling Castle Rock draws you in…
You start off imprisoned in the castle’s dungeon. Only with your trusted walkie-talkie in hand, your first task is to escape and meet up with your fellow explorer.

Will you and your partner uncover the grand puzzle that has been there all along? What if everything that has happened to you was always meant to be? Are you the missing puzzle piece in this ancient mystery that someone (or something) has been waiting for? 
And does one truly escape Castle Rock...

🌠 Wishlist now here 🌠
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1341290/We_Were_Here_Forever/
Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/we-were-here-forever
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002430
Xbox: Coming Soon!

🃏 Follow We Were Here news on our socials 🃏
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WeWereHereGame
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/aEz3ZZC
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WeWereHereGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/totalmayhemgames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@totalmayhemgames

#WeWereHereForever #CoOp #PuzzleGame
